feed.title: MeshCentral Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for MeshCentral: 1.1.29
entry.content:
• 0d56504d Version 1.1.29
  • d1791893 express-ws update.
  • 0a64b806 Updated express-ws.
  • 35e38a71 Re-translated & minified.
  • 6fe30b77 add new line break feature to file edit #6365
  • 516a14b4 Update readme.md
  • 39099112 fix pluginhandler http protocol #6362
  • d367b2ed few fixes and doc updates
  • 5a410ccd properly fix peering #5714
  • ad1d8215 fix clonesafenode in dbNodeChange #5591
  • 7c79dbcd fix peering traffic #5714
  • cf23a3df fix volumes not closing powershell
  • e8cbebaf fix webrtc file upload maybe #6309
  • ac0d8053 fix webrtcconfig and allow stun servers #6309
  • 7b48e3b5 update webrtc servers and examples
  • ea6682e0 fix passport failure url
  • 4e374554 fix agentdownload on agentonly port #3282
  • b4323223 support markdown in notes when using showNotesPanel #4091 #6332
  • bf00de44 full keyboard control in fullscreen using chrome in sharing #1881
  • f95dbdd4 allow full keyboard control in fullscreen using chrome #1881
  • e1e59953 fix remoteaddr null in consent disconnect #6290
  • d2d9f7a1 fix disconnections of new user logins with ldap #6240
  • 21e196e3 dont do utf8 validation for mongodb #6340
  • 0ccce62c dont minify charts or OL JS files #6338
  • 3a78cb83 add ukrainian agent-translations
  • 8dd5545a add Ukrainian translation #6335
  • 2f61e3ed Spanish update.
  • 7caf2aa0 fix file edit box missing data #5813
  • cee181fb fix meshcmd os select #6327
  • fa39f8a1 fix meshctrl with key=xxx and loginkey #6328
  • c1e3354c fix mysql autoback zippassword
  • aae551da autobackup improvements #6324
  • 3a28e33e use hardware identifier if no intelamt uuid
  • 92385e3d AMT: Fix One Click Recovery support (#6301)
  • adeaac15 getLocalAmtNodes only show intelamt devices fix #6321
  • 77f44fc3 fix local amt with sqlite/mysql/postgres #6321
  • 3efa6803 add png and tiff to encoding in web ui #6315
  • 899ff0c7 dont allow deleting yourself in my users tab in web ui
  • 61f1c22c update mpkg with arm64 support
  • 08877844 show seperate macos mpkgs in web ui #6308
  • 698b7fb0 Update apprelays.js to fix Header issue (#6306)
  • fbd45334 add intel amt identifier to ui to help find passwords in amtpasswords
  • 6f2b5799 fix agentidletimeout being undefined
  • a6acb35a Fixed typo.
  • fc29e609 Improved configuration file encryption in the database, added testing.
  • 5b76a316 Changed database file encryption to pbkdf2 for key derivation and aes-256-gcm for encryption (#6296)
  • 41e4213f update translate.json
  • 999ae7f6 add support for PXE reboot/power (#6298)
  • 44991975 Added ability to use environment variables as arguments (#6184)
  • 6da92228 add s3 autobackup support (#6280)
  • 10b57dcf fix default linuxshell for mobile ui #6275

entry.title: New release for MeshCentral: 1.1.30
entry.content:
• 626416a2 Version 1.1.30
  • d84afb93 More dependency updates.
  • 3cd875d6 Dependency update.
  • f5e63b7c Updated dependencies.
  • 8b20f44d Update meshuser.js (#6210)
  • 59a3a22e fix orphanagentuser toLowerCase() (#6317)
  • 2f34b7e8 Improved debug documentation.
  • 4d5ec6ca Docs: Adding meshcentral server debug command (#6369)
  • 7635109f fix: package.json & package-lock.json to reduce vulnerabilities (#6378)
  • de60b7f9 update meshcentralrouter with fixes
  • 405261a6 Dutch language update 1.1.29 (#6379)
  • 4bcec73e forgot new lines in backupconfig
  • d81c00c0 add extra info to backupconfig
  • d2e4f12e fix left mousebutton click with event.button #6351
  • f7c79166 fix dockerfile translate
  • 2b533732 remove minify-js use html-minifier instead #6357
  • 21206b67 refix #6240 as switching devices keep session open by mistake
  • 1d04a13a add oldStyle to consentMessages as workaround for win-userconsent crashing #6290
  • 9e309584 update package-lock 1.1.29

entry.title: New release for MeshCentral: 1.1.31
entry.content:
• a3fd6008 Version 1.1.31
  • d0014b3f Removed cleanReqQuery()
  • 04c96eb2 Fix/xss (#6403)
  • df64c750 add runCommands to server peering #6404
  • b90b2ac0 add RDP to device context menu #6401
  • 39a1755b fix 404 on public files with /login url #6406
  • 61fb6898 add ctrl+c ctrl+x and esc to mobile terminal ui
  • bc34f140 upgrade express-handlebars #6357
  • 0bee2be3 generate manifest.json from domain and add pwalogo
  • 1d67172d fix RDP canvas size #4701
  • b99a97eb add restart agent service to agent action
  • a1899a71 add freebsd install/uinstall/start/stop/restart commands #6040
  • 5fcfa8f3 fix storage volumes on arch/busybox
  • 7172d1f7 always show operating system section and LastBootUpTime fix
  • 8bc76085 add raspberry pi arm/gpu memory
  • 5fc3683e update archiver

entry.title: New release for MeshCentral: 1.1.32
entry.content:
• 4848df4f Version 1.1.32
  • 41d1f9d2 Revert "allow password resets when using allowaccountreset and reset together #6261"
  • 113adb5b add debug/log to schema file
  • 8e5aa35b allow password resets when using allowaccountreset and reset together #6261
  • 1139a373 update noVNC to 1.5.0
  • b20e5156 fix novnc missing desktopName from title #6412
  • 5ff44bba fix DeskTools only dragging one way #6257
  • 2beeb6f6 fix agentTimeStampServer and agentTimeStampProxy not being set correctly #6409

entry.title: New release for MeshCentral: 1.1.33
entry.content:
• 45169b2c Version 1.1.33
  • c09d2fad Can now switch to the bootstrap ui at runtime with ?sitestyle=3 in the url.
  • 7928f7fb fix ntfy missing user-agent #6488
  • 438289b2 few more bootstrap fixes
  • 561fc67f Adding LinkedIn and a few fixes (#6486)
  • aa7767f3 fix menu bar and swap icons in bootstrap
  • f2379288 more general web fixes and updates
  • c920b28a more bootstrap fixes
  • 36f1b4d5 Added global ws error handler (#6475)
  • 141bec55 AddLocalDevice and AddAmtDevice to meshctrl.js #6473
  • 0d885e6f fix some modals not working in bootstrap
  • e10f5277 improve bootstrap icons and formatting
  • f33768fe 1st bootstrap 5 cosmetic fixes
  • 1e565768 fix sitestyle for new bootstrap
  • 5193fef8 [BETA] Meshcentral Bootstrap 5 User Interface (#6450)
  • 63930c4b Use built-in login validation (#6434)
  • ac270345 update packages
  • cfe9345b require package version from correct folder
  • 1e2d736d pin openid-client to 5.7.0 for moment
  • 0c825251 Update sysinfo.js meshcmd (#6448)
  • ccf00b7d add annotation about using own IDP, CA and Docker (#6454)
  • 6d412a7b show local/relay devices in online filter #6440
  • 5a0d3054 fix reports missing multiplex desktop sessions #6445
  • 6dbc6d2d update express to fix xss
  • ea8e1b10 fix log.txt with json objects
  • d1368791 move orphanAgentUser to domain config-schema
  • 590166f8 fix meshaction with foldr based domains #6436
  • 19d0df7e always show active users for offline devices #6421
  • 1d87c429 Fixed bug with agent reconnecting (#6431)
  • ec750598 fix login button disabled when autofilled #6428
  • 37729269 fix public folder sharing for domains without dns
  • 952bcde2 refix publicfiles sharing for folder based domains #6406
